info.title: E-Commerce API Documentation
info.description: API endpoints for the E-Commerce Application

get.summary: Get all addresses for the authenticated user

post.summary: Create a new address for the authenticated user

put.summary: Update an existing address for the authenticated user

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: ID of the address to update

403.description: Forbidden - You do not have permission to update this address

message.example: You do not have permission to update this address.

delete.summary: Delete an address for the authenticated user

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: ID of the address to delete

403.description: Forbidden - You do not have permission to delete this address

message.example: You do not have permission to delete this address.
User registered successfully. Please check your email to verify.

post.summary: Log in an existing user and receive a Sanctum token
Log out user and invalidate the current token

message.example: Failed to send OTP. Please try again later.

post.summary: Verify OTP and return auth token

put.summary: Update product quantity in the cart

post.summary: Add a product to the cart

delete.summary: Remove a product from the cart

get.description: Retrieve products based on optional filters provided in the JSON body.

category_ids.description: Array of category IDs to filter by

search.description: Search term for name or description

get.summary: Get authenticated user's profile and addresses

200.description: User profile data with loaded addresses

put.summary: Update authenticated user's profile (name and/or email).

requestBody.description: User data to update (fields are optional)

delete.summary: Delete the authenticated user's account and all associated tokens

message.example: The provided current password does not match your password.

put.summary: Reset password for authenticated user (without old password)

ErrorValidation.title: Validation Error
ErrorValidation.description: Standard response for 422 Unprocessable Entity due to validation failures

items.example: The email has already been taken.

ErrorValidationAuth.title: Authentication Validation Error
ErrorValidationAuth.description: Validation error response for authentication endpoints (register, login)

items.example: The email has already been taken.
The password must be at least 8 characters.

ErrorValidationUser.title: User Profile Validation Error
ErrorValidationUser.description: Validation error response for user profile endpoints (update profile, change password)

items.example: The name field must not exceed 255 characters.
The email must be a valid email address.
The current password field is required.
The password must be at least 8 characters.

ErrorValidationAddress.title: Address Validation Error
ErrorValidationAddress.description: Validation error response for address endpoints (create, update address)

items.example: The street must not exceed 255 characters.
The phone numbers field must be an array with at least 1 item.
Each phone number must not exceed 13 characters.

message.example: No query results for model [App\\Models\\ModelName] ID.

description.example: High quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation.

ErrorValidationCart.title: Cart Validation Error
ErrorValidationCart.description: Validation error response for cart endpoints

items.example: The quantity must be at least 1.

ErrorInternalServer.title: Internal Server Error
ErrorInternalServer.description: Standard response for 500 Internal Server Error

SuccessMessage.title: Success Message
SuccessMessage.description: Standard success response with a message

SuccessResource.title: Success Resource
SuccessResource.description: Standard success response with a resource

SuccessCollection.title: Success Collection
SuccessCollection.description: Standard success response with a collection

SuccessPaginatedCollection.title: Success Paginated Collection
SuccessPaginatedCollection.description: Standard success response with a paginated collection

SuccessNoContent.title: Success No Content
SuccessNoContent.description: Standard success response for 204 No Content

ErrorMethodNotAllowed.title: Method Not Allowed
ErrorMethodNotAllowed.description: Standard response for 405 Method Not Allowed

ErrorTooManyRequests.title: Too Many Requests
ErrorTooManyRequests.description: Standard response for 429 Too Many Requests

ErrorUnsupportedMediaType.title: Unsupported Media Type
ErrorUnsupportedMediaType.description: Standard response for 415 Unsupported Media Type

ErrorPayloadTooLarge.title: Payload Too Large
ErrorPayloadTooLarge.description: Standard response for 413 Payload Too Large

ErrorUriTooLong.title: URI Too Long
ErrorUriTooLong.description: Standard response for 414 URI Too Long

ErrorRequestHeaderFieldsTooLarge.title: Request Header Fields Too Large
ErrorRequestHeaderFieldsTooLarge.description: Standard response for 431 Request Header Fields Too Large

ErrorUnavailableForLegalReasons.title: Unavailable For Legal Reasons
ErrorUnavailableForLegalReasons.description: Standard response for 451 Unavailable For Legal Reasons

ErrorVariantAlsoNegotiates.title: Variant Also Negotiates
ErrorVariantAlsoNegotiates.description: Standard response for 506 Variant Also Negotiates

ErrorNetworkAuthenticationRequired.title: Network Authentication Required
ErrorNetworkAuthenticationRequired.description: Standard response for 511 Network Authentication Required

bearerAuth.description: Enter your Sanctum token in the format: Bearer {token}
